name: pulsetalk
description: **PulseTalk** is a real-time chat and video calling application built using the **MERN stack** (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). It enables users to send instant messages, make high-quality video calls, and stay connected through a clean, modern interface. Designed with real-time communication at its core, PulseTalk is fast, responsive, and secure.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build  --prefix frontend
